channel.title: INFECTED SERVER LIST/How to avoid!
channel.description:
Hey guys, I thought some buddy had to make a post like this.. I guess it's me ;)
Known servers with viruses:
-ParScape (keylogger) -ArizonaScape (keylogger) ------------------ How to avoid!
Never run a command without right clicking and editing it to make sure it contains only what you expect it to do! If it has .exe it is most likely a malicous program that the prompt will open when you run it.
Example: When you compile or run in ParScape a keylogger runs.
-------- Removing KeyLoggers: Get Malwarebytes' Anti-Malware and scan AFTER you go to task manager and end the keylogger. --------
If you know of a server with a virus please report it here! Together we can make Moparscape a safer community!

item.title: INFECTED SERVER LIST/How to avoid!
item.dc:creator: @crimim crimim
item.description:
@crimim wrote:

viruses will always be a step ahead of anti-viruses,this is how it will always be untill the internet is some how annilated or some shit,we cant do anything to stop this,in some places you can possibly reduce it but no sites will never be safe. you risk everything you enter online every time you enter a site or download something…

Hey guys, I thought some buddy had to make a post like this… I guess it’s me

Known servers with viruses:

-ParScape (keylogger)
-ArizonaScape (keylogger)

How to avoid!

Never run a command without right clicking and editing it to make sure it contains only what you expect it to do! If it has .exe it is most likely a malicous program that the prompt will open when you run it.
